thread.title: Louis Vuitton Unveils Incredible New Small Accessories Range for Spring 2017
thread.title_full: Louis Vuitton Unveils Incredible New Small Accessories Range for Spring 2017

author: David Fischer
title: Louis Vuitton Unveils Incredible New Small Accessories Range for Spring 2017
text:
Visit the original post to see all 9 images from this gallery. 
Best known for its incredible craftsmanship in leather goods, Louis Vuitton has unveiled a new “Gifting” collection for 2017. The range includes goods from three domains: writing goods, everyday basics and gaming. The writing range includes pens, graphite pencils, fine notepads, stylized bookmarks, and leather encased ink pads. The everyday basics range consists of mirrors, leather boxes with the flower monogram, leather picture frames embossed with the initials of the House, and porcelain desk tidies. Finally, the gaming part of the collection includes dice sets, card games, colored leather discs, spinning tops and a yoyo. Overall an excellent range of presents that of course stand-out just like the rest of the brand’s product due to their incredible details and quality standards. Look out for these goods to land in Louis Vuitton boutiques soon.
